Articles.Content:
Finally landed a rover mostly intact today on the Mun. However my botched landing caused my rover to inadvertantly sheer right off my lander while its engines were still active causing it to leave my intrepid kerbals stranded. and of course make shiny explosions all over the place about 500m away.

The Kerbals got out to survey the damage and take in the view. I took the opertunity to caption this photo commemorating the incident.

Thanks to the companies providing the parts that made the landing a partial success!

and now on to the new mission... Rescue from the Mun!
